title: Net income of Marriott International worldwide 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net income in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Net income in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The line rapidly increased by 188.38% from Year 2011 to 2012, and lastly, increased by 75.9% from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Net income in million U.S. dollars, of value 1907.0 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Net income in million U.S. dollars, of value 198.0 was reported at Year 2011
